channel.title: Soul Light 317
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KIqKAGr.png[/img]
[FONT=Arial Black][U][B][SIZE=4]About Us[/SIZE][/B][/U][/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]We are a new server looking to grow an active community. Right now our player base is nothing but we are hoping to change that! We have plenty of features that you may enjoy. Currently we are only using a temporary site because I have not bothered to get a paid hosting due to the uncertainty of how successful I will be. Although if we do get a good amount of players then surely I will purchase a site and include many features in it and add more updates to the server.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][B][U][SIZE=4]Link[/SIZE][/U][/B][/FONT] [SIZE=4][URL=http://soullight.tk/]Play[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[FONT=Arial Black][B][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B][/FONT] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3W0odjK.png[/img]
